item.description:
👤 Owner: AliRizaAynaci

📝 Repository: AliRizaAynaci/gorl

📄 Descrizione: A high-performance, modular rate limiting library for Go. Supports in-memory and Redis backends. Includes Fixed Window, Sliding Window, Token Bucket, and Leaky Bucket algorithms. Flexible keying (IP, API key, token, or custom). Production-ready. Easy integration.
